extendedInfo.description: â Over 25 million users worldwide and countingâ Named "Top Developer" by Google.â Featured in the book "Amazing Android Apps for Dummies"â Top communication/social app for yearsâÂ Completely FREE. No hidden fee or ads.Instantly speak to or text one or many friends at once with the touch of a button. No setup needed, just have them in your address book or as Facebook friends. Fast and simple - TiKL turns your phone into the ultimate Push To Talk (PTT) Walkie Talkie with instant messenger capability.â Quick one-on-one/group voice push-to-talk calls.â Lightning fast chat with delivery confirmation.â Uses data connection only. No voice minutes or SMS used for TiKL calls or chats.â Works across carriers and Android/iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch.â Connects on WiFi, 3G, 4G, EDGE and GPRS.â Create widgets by long pressing any blank space on your home screen.â What if their device is off? No worries. TiKL automatically delivers your messages the moment it is turned on.We are on Facebook and Twitter:http://www.tikl.mobihttp://www.facebook.com/TiKL.TouchToTalkhttp://twitter.com/TiKLTouchToTalkTo ensure that you do not miss any incoming TiKL calls or chats, please launch the app at least once after installing/upgrading it.If things don't work after updating, please uninstall and reinstall.

reviews.title: Exceptional..!!
reviews.comment: So convenient to push a button and talk to my family/friends immediately, rather than waiting for the call to go thru ! #Satisfied   :)
reviews.author: Juel Grubbs

reviews.comment: Luv its convience and quickness. Will reconmend
reviews.author: Lori Chaffee

reviews.title: Great app!!!
reviews.comment: Lets my family keep in touch instantly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best...
reviews.comment: Best PTT for my needs.I\'m disabled and spend most of my time in bed. My husband is usually out in the living room. We can talk without getting up or having to yell at one another! It works over longer distances too!
reviews.author: Cheri Rives

reviews.title: Amazing App
reviews.comment: The app works really well but I wish it was a little more polished with the interface looking somewhat dated.

reviews.title: Good

reviews.title: Needs tweaking
reviews.comment: I asked if they could add option to change the PTT sound they said they would put it in next update... that was 3 updates ago still no option.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: App is awesome. Great if you don\'t have unlimited text and talk. Just push a button and you and your friend are talking away.

reviews.title: Can\'t use with daughter
reviews.comment: I would rate this 5 stars but my daughter can\'t download this on her Galaxy phone. that was the only reason I wanted it was to keep in contact with her.

reviews.title: Love it. Bluetooth one day?
reviews.comment: Great product but it would be cool to use a bluetooth too. Haven\'t found a setting for it.
